2500.name: The Entrance To The Shadow Grove
2500.description: Before you, the grove of shadows lies.  Giant grey trees are all that can be seen through the thick shadows.  A great sense of both power and menace permeates the surrounding area.  You have a strange urge to turn back and go back the way you've come.    A small path leads north into the shadows and back south to the plains.

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

south.description: The copse of trees and plains are back to the south.

2501.name: The Shadow Grove
2501.description: You are inside the shadow grove.  Giant trees seem to glare at you from all sides.  The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision.  Strange sounds of moaning and growling come from all directions.    All exits lead into shadows, you are very confused.

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

2502.name: The Shadow Grove
2502.description: You are inside the shadow grove.  Giant trees seem to glare at you from all sides.  The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision.  Strange sounds moaning and growling come from all directions.    All exits lead into shadows, you are very confused.

north.description: You see a small clearing in the shadows.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

2503.name: The Shadow Grove
2503.description: You are inside the shadow grove.  Giant trees seem the glare at you from all sides.  The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision.  Strange sounds of moaning and growling come from all directions.    All exits lead into shadows, you are very confused.

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

2504.name: The Shadow Grove
2504.description: You are inside the shadow grove.  Giant trees seem to glare at you from all sides.  The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision.  Strange sounds of moaning and growling come from all directions.    All exits lead into shadows, you are very confused.

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

2505.name: The Shadow Grove
2505.description: You are inside the shadow grove.  Giant trees seem to glare at you from all sides.  The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision.  Strange sounds of moaning and growling come from all directions.    All exits lead into shadows, you are very confused.

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

2506.name: The Shadow Grove
2506.description: You are inside the shadow grove.  Giant trees seem to glare at you from all sides.  The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision.  Strange sounds of moaning and growling come from all directions.    All exits lead into shadows, you are very confused.

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

west.description: You see a small clearing in the shadows.

2507.name: The Shadow Grove
2507.description: You are inside the shadow grove.  Giant trees seem to glare at you from all sides.  The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision.  Strange sounds of moaning and growling come from all directions.    All exits lead into shadows, you are very confused.

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

2508.name: The Shadow Grove
2508.description: You are inside the shadow grove.  Giant trees seem to glare at you from all sides.  The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision.  Strange sounds of moaning and growling come from all directions.    All exits lead into shadows, you are very confused.

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

2509.name: The Shadow Grove
2509.description: You are inside the shadow grove.  Giant trees seem to glare at you from all sides.  The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision.  Strange sounds of moaning and growling come from all directions.    All directions lead into shadows, you are very confused.

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

2510.name: The Shadow Grove
2510.description: You are inside the shadow grove.  Giant trees seem to glare at you from all sides.  The shadowy mist obscures most of your vision.  Strange sounds of moaning and growling come from all directions.    All directions lead into shadows, you are very confused.

north.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

east.description: The shadows part to reveal a small clearing.

2511.name: A Small Clearing
2511.description: You are in a small clearing in the shadow grove.  There is charred grass underfoot, and the signs of fire here and there.  It is almost as if the plant life shuns this spot.  The shadowy mist hovers all around, obscuring your view into the grove.    A small path leads north to some shadowy structure.  All other exits are shrouded in shadowy mist.

north.description: You can barely make out some sort of building to the north.

east.description: The shadows obscure your vision.

2512.name: The Entrance To The High Tower
2512.description: You have reached the entrance to the High Tower of Sorcery.  The tower looms above you at an incredible height.  It seems to disappear into the storm clouds above.    A diamond gate is to the north, whilst the trail back south has disappeared behind you.

north.description: The diamond gate looks incredibly strong.

2513.name: Inside The High Tower Of Sorcery
2513.description: You are inside the High Tower of Sorcery.  The sight is truly amazing. From here, it is obvious that somehow, the tower is much larger on the inside than it is on the outside.  Young mages walk about, completely oblivious to your presence.    Exits lead north to the common room, west to the dinning room, east to a plain hallway and back south through the gate.

north.description: The common room looks quite busy and noisy.

2514.name: Common Room
2514.description: You are in the common room.  There are many apprentice warlocks here talking and resting, playing games, comparing notes.  Obviously they are taking a break from their rigorous studies.  There are benches, tables and a small water fountain here, otherwise the room is quite unremarkable.    Exits lead off in all directions.

east.description: The mages' bar can be seen to the east.

2515.name: The Hallway
2515.description: You are in a long hallway, it seems rather unremarkable.  The hallway continues east and back west.

2516.name: The Dining Room
2516.description: You are in the dining area of the student mages.  From the number of tables and chairs here, you can see that this room could easily seat several hundred people.  It is oddly deserted here, obviously not meal time.    Exits lead west to the kitchen, and back east.

2517.name: A Dark Hallway
2517.description: You are in a dark hallway.  It is apparent that this area is seldom used by the regular occupants of the tower.  Dust covers the floors here.    The faint outline of a trapdoor can be seen in the dust.

2518.name: The Mages' Tavern
2518.description: You are in the mages' tavern.  The air is smokey and filled with the smells of foreign food and drink.  The other patrons pay you little heed, as they obviously have more interesting things to contemplate.    The only exit leads back west.

2519.name: The Magic Shop
2519.description: You are in the High Tower's store of magic.  This place sells all sorts of herbs, parchment and other reagents used in magical studies.    The only exit leads back east to the common room.

2520.name: The Kitchen
2520.description: You are in a small kitchen.  All the usual kitchen type utensils and equipment is here, including some not so usual ones.  Among the later, a huge black oven against one wall, it must be at least 12 feet high.    Opposite the oven is an equally enormous meat locker, large enough to comfortably store several hapless adventurers no doubt.  In the middle of the room, hanging in mid-air is a spice rack.

2521.name: Below The Trapdoor
2521.description: You are below the trapdoor.  It is very dark and dusty here, very little light filters through from above.  A faint sound of dripping water can be heard in the distance below.    A rope ladder leads down.

2522.name: A Damp Intersection
2522.description: You are in a damp intersection of what seems to be the basement of the tower.  The sound of running water can be heard coming from the south, other than that, an almost tangible stillness fills the air.    Passages lead off in all directions, and a ladder leads up.

east.description: A faint light can be seen in the distance up the east passage.

2523.name: A Dark Passage
2523.description: You are at the end of a dark passage which ends in a stout wooden door. Other then through the door, the only apparent exit is back the way you came.

2524.name: A Dark Passage
2524.description: You are at the end of a dark passage.  A half opened door is to the east, shedding soft light around the edges.  Faint snoring sounds can be heard behind the door.    Exits lead east through the door, or back west.

2525.name: The Stagnant Pool
2525.description: You are at the edge of a stagnant pool of water.  The smell here is quite nauseating.  This is apparently where the denizens of the tower dispose of their garbage.  Faint gurgling can be heard from beneath the surface of the pool.    Exits lead back north, or perhaps for the very adventurous, down into the pool.

down.description: No light penetrates the gloom of the stagnant pool.

2526.name: A Dark Passage
2526.description: You are in a dark passage, which comes to an abrupt stop at what appears to be a cave-in to the west.  It is certainly unpassable, and perhaps quite dangerous just being this close.    The only exit leads back east.

2527.name: A Dark Cell
2527.description: You are in a dark cell.  Straw and dirt cover the floors here, it is very dark.  Someone, or something seems to be chained to the far wall.    The only exit is back south.

2528.name: The Jailor's office
2528.description: You are in the Jailor's office.  It is rather messy here.  Judging by the sleeping form of the Jailor on duty, you can surmise that very few, if any prisoners survive long enough to spend much time in these dank dungeons.    The only exit leads back west.

2529.name: Below The Stagnant Pool
2529.description: As you dive beneath the putrid waters, you feel a strong tug and a whirlpool drags you under.  You are sucked into blackness.  You feel your lungs burst from lack of oxygen.  Just as you feel your life fading, you notice a change in direction... and are sucked under by a rip tide.

2530.name: The Hallway
2530.description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

2531.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2531.description: You are at a bend in the hallway.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

2532.name: A Store Room
2532.description: You are in a small store room.  Assorted junk is piled on shelves or leaning against walls.    The only apparent exit it back south.

2533.name: A Broom Closet
2533.description: You are in a dark broom closet.  Many straw brooms and other cleaning instruments have been left here, apparently unused (perhaps the maid quit?).    The only exit leads back north to the hallway.

2534.name: A Hallway
2534.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

2535.name: The Guardians' chamber
2535.description: You are in the chamber of the tower guardians.  It is rather sparsely furnished, but then again the odd occupants don't look to need furniture. Here and there a disembodied pair of hands or eyes flits about.

2536.name: A Guest Bedroom
2536.description: You are in a small guest bedroom.  A small cot is in one corner, and a dusty mirror on one wall, other than that the room looks quite bare, and unused.    The only apparent exit leads back west to the hallway.

2537.name: A Guest Bedroom
2537.description: You are in a comfortable looking bedroom.  A small globe of magical energy floats overhead, providing light.  A small cot is in one corner looking ever so comfortable, so comfortable in fact... someone is sleeping in it.    The only apparent exit leads back west to the hallway.

2538.name: A hallway
2538.description: You are in a long hallway leading from the south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    Stairs lead up to the next level and the hallway leads back south.

2539.name: The Burnt Room
2539.description: You are in what looks to have once been a guest bed room.  The walls are blackened and burnt by what you could only imagine to be magical fire. There is no sign of the previous occupant, undoubtedly he left in a hurry.    The only exit leads back west to the hallway.

2540.name: A Hallway
2540.description: You are in a long hallway leading west from here.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.  Some faint moonlight can be seen in the cul de sac to the east.    The hallway continues west and stairs lead down to the level below.

east.description: Faint moonlight can be seen to the east.

2541.name: A Cul De Sac
2541.description: You are in a small cul de sac.  A window to the east is letting in moonlight and a pleasant breeze.  Through it, the surrounding country side can be seen.    The only apparent exit leads back west to the hallway.

2542.name: The Apprentices' Barracks
2542.description: You are in the barracks of the apprentice magic users.  Here and there, a young apprentice sits engrossed in magical study, or practicing a feeble cantrip.  Cots line the walls, and the room continues west.

2543.name: A Hallway
2543.description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    There is a door to the north, and the hallway continues west or back east.

2544.name: The Apprentices' Barracks
2544.description: You are in the barracks of the apprentice magic users.  Here and there, a young apprentice sits engrossed in magical study, or practicing a feeble cantrip.  Cots line the walls, and the room continues east.

2545.name: A Hallway
2545.description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.  Flashes of light can be seen under the doorway to the north.

north.description: A flash of blue light momentarily lights up the door's outline.

2546.name: The Apprentices' Workshop
2546.description: You are in a small workshop.  Writing implements and parchment are strewn about on a few worktables.  In the far corner several young mages have a small kitten cornered and seem to be testing spells upon it.    The only apparent exit leads back south to the hallway.

2547.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2547.description: You are at a bend in the hallway.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    The hallway continues south and back east.

2548.name: The Hallway
2548.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    There is a closed metal door to the west.

2549.name: A Classroom
2549.description: You are in a large classroom filled with bored looking students of the art.  The instructor stops in his lecture on the fine uses of magic missile at your entry and lunges to attack you.    The only apparent exit is back east to the hallway.

2550.name: A Hallway
2550.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

2551.name: A Hallway
2551.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

2552.name: An Empty Classroom
2552.description: You are in an empty classroom.  Some strange sigils are written on a blackboard which is floating in the air here.  Other than a few desks, it is bare of furnishings.    The only apparent exit leads back east to the hallway.

2553.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2553.description: You are at a bend in the hallway.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    The hallway continues east and north.

2554.name: An Empty Classroom
2554.description: You are in an apparently empty classroom.  A strange feeling of being watched comes over you, and you hear the faint rustle of robes.    The only apparent exit is back east to the hallway.

2555.name: A Hallway
2555.description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    A sturdy iron door can be seen to the south.

2556.name: A Hallway
2556.description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    There is a large oaken door to the south.

2557.name: The Amphitheater
2557.description: You are in a small amphitheater.  Rows of comfortable looking chairs circle a large podium.  The echos of your footsteps seem very loud here.    The only apparent exit leads north to the hallway.

2558.name: A Hallway
2558.description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow providing enough light to see by.    A small door can be seen to the south.

2559.name: The Training Room
2559.description: You are in a large training room.  It is filled with battle scared manikins, and many other devices used in the practice of fighting.

2560.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2560.description: You are at a bend in the hallway.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    The hallway continues north and west.

2561.name: A Dueling Room
2561.description: You are in a large room used for duals arcane.  The walls, ceiling and floor all bare the scars of many fiery spells, but still look quite strong and hold fast.    The only exit leads north to the hallway.

2562.name: A Hallway
2562.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    A doorway can be seen to the east.

2563.name: A Hallway
2563.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    A wooden door can been seen to the east.

2564.name: The Spellmasters' Lounge
2564.description: You are in a large comfortable looking lounge.  Off duty spell teachers are here relaxing in their idle time.  A large coffee machine is against the far wall.    The only apparent exit leads back west to the hallway.

2565.name: A Bedroom
2565.description: You are in a large, plush bedroom.  The owner is obviously someone of high standing in the magical community here.  An ice mirror is on one wall, and a scrying globe sit on a stand in the middle of the room.  An enormous bed can be seen floating about a meter above the floor.    The only exit leads back west to the hallway.

2566.name: A Hallway
2566.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow providing enough light to see by.    A glass door can be seen to the east.

2567.name: The Study
2567.description: You are in a small, well kept study.  Ancient tomes are on shelves on the walls, A huge table sits in the middle of the room, with maps weighted down upon it.  The only light source here comes from an interestingly non-magical oil lamp.    The only apparent exit leads back west to the hallway.

2568.name: Below The Stairs
2568.description: You are at the end of a long hallway.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.  A lesser guardian is here keeping silent watch on the entrance to the levels above.    Stairs lead up and the hallway continues back south.

2569.name: Atop The Stairway
2569.description: You are atop a stairway.  The halls here look quite a bit less used than those below.  Obviously access to these magic filled corridors is limited to those of the upper echelon of mages.  The walls here emit a faint blue magical aura which provides some light.    The hallway leads west from here and the stairs go down.

2570.name: A Hallway
2570.description: You are in a long hallway stretching east and west.  The walls here emit a faint magical energy providing enough light to see by.    There is a thick looking wooden door to the north.

2571.name: A Small Office
2571.description: You are in a small office.  It looks like a calligrapher's study, there are quills, inkpots and parchments all about on desks and worktables.    A section to the west seems to be curtained off, but the flicker of a candle can be seen through the curtain.

2572.name: A Hallway
2572.description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

2573.name: The Master Scribe's Workshop
2573.description: You are in the workshop of the tower's master scribe.  Many half finished scrolls lay on the writing table in the center of the room. A giant candle flickering with soft blue flames provides the only light here.    The only apparent exit is the way you came in.

2574.name: A Hallway
2574.description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    A half-closed door can be seen to the north.

north.description: A dark room can be seen through the half-opened door.

2575.name: A Store Room
2575.description: You are in a small dark store room.  A few common items are stacked upon the shelves here, but very little looks interesting.

2576.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2576.description: You are at a bend in the long hallway.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    The hallway continues south and east from here.

2577.name: A Hallway
2577.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    An iron bound door can be seen to the west.

2578.name: A Hallway
2578.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    The sharp sound of metal on metal can be heard to the west.

2579.name: A Store Room
2579.description: You are in a large store room.  Bins of ores, minerals and other rare materials are here along with many neatly stacked piles of precious metals.  The ring of metal on metal can be heard to the south.  A large cabinet with sigils of warding is bolted to one wall.

2580.name: A Hallway
2580.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

2581.name: A Very Hot Room
2581.description: You are in a very hot room.  Against one wall is a large forge, magical fires crackle within and heavy blue smoke pours into a vent in the ceiling. A rune-encrusted mithril anvil is in the center of the room, looking well used.  Other tools of metallurgy hang on a rack which floats about three meters in the air of its own force.

2582.name: The Master Enchanter's Chamber
2582.description: You have entered the Master Enchanter's chamber.  Upon all the walls here are racks of finely crafted weapons.  A huge chest with a glowing lock is set to one side.  Several unfinished looking blades rest atop a small work table.

2583.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2583.description: You are at a bend in a long hallway.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    The hallway continues north and east.

2584.name: A Hallway
2584.description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    A steel door can be seen to the south.

2585.name: A Hallway
2585.description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

2586.name: A Laboratory
2586.description: You are in a small laboratory.  Many strange instruments, vials, bottles and some scrawled notes are piled about a workbench.  This room is very untidy, looking almost abandoned, or used by a madman.    The only apparent exits are east and north.

2587.name: A Hallway
2587.description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    You can see a steel door to the south.

2588.name: The Mad Alchemist's Workroom
2588.description: You are in the workroom of The Mad Alchemist.  Bubbling braziers, long glass tubes and scores of oddly shaped vials and bottles are everywhere.  It is incredibly messy here, crushed glass and other trash litter the floor.    The only apparent exit is the one you entered by.

2589.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2589.description: You are at a bend in a long hallway.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    The hallway continues north and west.

2590.name: The Pentagram Chamber
2590.description: You are in a large room with a five pointed star etched into the floor.  A crackling energy field can be seen to the south, it looks quite dangerous.

south.description: The energy field crackles and glows, nothing seems to be beyond.

2591.name: A Hallway
2591.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    A bronze door can be seen to the east.

2592.name: Inside The Energy Field
2592.description: You feel a stomach twisting sensation as you enter the energy field. Nice going!  You might as well wait here until the wizard who built this trap comes back to imprison your soul as well as your body.

2593.name: A Hallway
2593.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    A bronze door can be seen to the east.

2594.name: An Empty Room
2594.description: You are in an empty room.  It is both quiet and comfortable here, it looks like a safe place to rest.

2595.name: The Charm Master's Chamber
2595.description: You are in the chambers of the tower's Master of Charm.  Some straw and dirt litters the floor here, it looks to have been recently used by wild animals.    Strange sounds can be heard through the bars to the north.

2596.name: A Hallway
2596.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

2597.name: The Animal Pens
2597.description: You are in the animal pens.  Many caged animals are here looking unhappy. Obviously they are destined to be enslaved, or used in some cruel magical experimentation.

2598.name: The End Of The Hallway
2598.description: You are at the end of a long north-south hallway.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    Stairs here lead up to the next level, and the hallway continues south.

2599.name: Atop The Stairway
2599.description: You are atop the stairway to the upper levels of the high tower.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    A hallway leads west from here, and the stairs lead down.

2600.name: A Hallway
2600.description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    A silver door can be seen to the north.

2601.name: A Store Room
2601.description: You are in a large store room.  Raw materials are neatly bundled and piled here and here.  Many freshly cut staves rods and wands of different sizes are here.    You can see a silver door to the west.

2602.name: The Master Spellbinder's Chamber
2602.description: You are in the chambers of the Master Spellbinder.  Unlike other work shops of similar nature, this one is without furnishings or tools.  The spell binder obviously needs none for the working of his art.    A silver door can be seen to the west.

2603.name: The Spellbinder's Cache
2603.description: You have discovered the cache of the Master Spellbinder.  There are three very large silver chased cabinets here, other than that, the room is bare.    A silver door can be seen to the south.

2604.name: A Hallway
2604.description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

2605.name: A Hallway
2605.description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    A silver door can be seen to the north.

2606.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2606.description: You are at a bend in the long hallway.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    The hallway continues east and south.

2607.name: A Hallway
2607.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

2608.name: A Hallway
2608.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    A rusty old door can be seen to the west.

2609.name: The Golem Master's Workshop
2609.description: You are in the golem master's workshop.  A few unfinished looking humanoid forms of different make are here, some moving, some not.  The animated forms lunge to attack you.

2610.name: A Store Room
2610.description: You are in a small store room.  Large chunks of clay, stone, wood and many other raw materials are here.

2611.name: The Golem Chamber
2611.description: You are in the golem chamber.  Golems made of every imaginable material are here, ranging in size from a hand-span to nearly the ceiling.  They all seem to be sleeping.

2613.name: A Hallway
2613.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

2614.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2614.description: You are at a bend in the long hallway.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    The hallway continues north and east from here.

2615.name: A Hallway
2615.description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

2616.name: A Hallway
2616.description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    An emerald door can be seen to the south.

2617.name: The Illusion Master's Chamber
2617.description: You are in the chamber of the Master of Illusions.  The walls here are ever changing in colour and texture, as if they were reforming before your very eyes.  Many splendorous treasures lie all around in heaps and piles, or at least they seem to be treasures...

2618.name: A Bedroom
2618.description: You are in the bedroom of the Master of Illusions.  Strange looking items and artifacts float here and there in the air.  The ripples of strong magic can be felt everywhere.    The room seems much larger than it looks...

north.description: The room stretches off to the north.

south.description: The room stretches off to the south.

west.description: The room stretches off to the west.

2619.name: A Hallway
2619.description: You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    A glass door can be seen to the south.

2620.name: The Meditation Chamber
2620.description: You are in a meditation chamber.  It is very silent here, in fact you can not even hear your own footsteps.    You feel very peaceful.

2621.name: A Bend In The Hallway
2621.description: You are at a bend in the long hallway.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    The hallway continues north and west from here.

2622.name: A Hallway
2622.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    A blackened door can be seen to the east.

2623.name: A Dark Room
2623.description: You are in a large dark room.  The air here seems quite stale, and a sense of extreme dread comes over you.  The stench of rotten flesh seems to be wafting in from the open doorway to the north.

2624.name: A Dark Room
2624.description: You are in a large dark room.  The stench here makes you gag and retch. There are body parts and half rotted corpses strewn about with complete abandon.  Several operating tables with still forms that resemble nothing you have ever seen alive are here.    Tortured screams can be heard from the north.

north.description: Gazing northwards, you are filled with deep dread.

2625.name: The Necromancer's Lair
2625.description: You are in the lair of the evil Necromancer.  Undead minions of all types, human and otherwise stand here waiting to do their master's bidding. Some glowing arcane sigils have been etched into walls and floor, no doubt to protect the evil master from his own ungodly creations.

2626.name: A Hallway
2626.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

2627.name: A Hallway
2627.description: You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

2628.name: The End Of The Hallway
2628.description: You are at the end of a long hallway.  The walls here glow with a faint magical energy which provides plenty of light.    Stairs lead up to the next level here and the hallway continues south.

2629.name: A Corridor
2629.description: You are at the east end of a long corridor.  Obsidian walls engraved with ancient runes of power stretch out before you. Magical energies seem to crackle with power all around and whisper in tongues long forgotten, almost as if the corridor itself were alive.

2630.name: A Corridor
2630.description: You are in a long corridor.  Obsidian walls engraved with ancient runes of power stretch out before you.  Magical energies seem to crackle with power all around and whisper in tongues long forgotten, almost as if the corridor itself were alive.

2631.name: A Bend In The Corridor
2631.description: You are at a bend in the long corridor.  Obsidian walls engraved with ancient runes of power stretch out before you.  Magical energies seem to crackle with power all around and whisper in tongues long forgotten, almost as if the corridor itself were alive.

2632.name: A Corridor
2632.description: You are in a long corridor leading north and south.  Obsidian walls engraved with ancient runes of power stretch out before you.  Magical energies seem to crackle with power all around and whisper in tongues long forgotten, almost as if the corridor itself were alive.

2633.name: An Intersection
2633.description: You are at an intersection in the corridor.  The obsidian walled halls lead off in every direction from here, pulsing with the power of their ancient runes.

2634.name: A Corridor
2634.description: You are at the end of a long corridor.  Obsidian walls engraved with ancient runes of power stretch out before you.  A darkened door is to the east.  Tendrils of mist cling to the floor here, they seem to be seeping from under the door.

2635.name: The Scrying Chamber
2635.description: You are in the scrying chamber of the high tower of sorcerery.  It is here that arcane rituals are performed to enable those of the art to look in upon denizens throughout the world and spy out their darkest secrets. A huge black cauldron is in the center of the room, bubbling and gurgling, it pours forth a constant stream of smokey fog into the air about you.  Here and there on stands of different sizes are crystal balls and oddly shaped mirrors.

2636.name: A Corridor
2636.description: You have reached an end in the long corridor.  Obsidian walls engraved with ancient runes of power stretch out before you.  The sound of snoring can barely be heard through the door to the west.

2637.name: The Entrance To The Library
2637.description: You are in the entrance to the great library of magic.  A giant desk is here, covered with books parchments and scrolls.  Long shelves loaded with row upon row of books stretch out in every direction as far as the eye can see.

north.description: All you can see are books.

south.description: All you can see are books.

west.description: All you can see are books.

2638.name: In The Library
2638.description: You are in the great library of magic.  A strong musty smell permeates the entire area.  Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds of books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and colour.  The elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained eyes.  It is very quiet here.

north.description: All you can see are books.

east.description: All you can see are books.

south.description: All you can see are books.

west.description: All you can see are books.

2639.name: In The Library
2639.description: You are in the great library of magic.  A strong musty smell permeates the entire area.  Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds of books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and colour.  The elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained eyes.  It is very quiet here.

north.description: All you can see are books.

east.description: All you can see are books.

south.description: All you can see are books.

west.description: All you can see are books.

2640.name: In The Library
2640.description: You are in the great library of magic.  A strong musty smell permeates the entire area.  Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds of books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and colour.  The elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained eyes.  It is very quiet here.

north.description: All you can see are books.

east.description: All you can see are books.

south.description: All you can see are books.

west.description: All you can see are books.

2641.name: In The Library
2641.description: You are in the great library of magic.  A strong musty smell permeates the entire area.  Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds of books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and colour.  The elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained eyes.  It is very quiet here.

north.description: All you can see are books.

east.description: All you can see are books.

south.description: All you can see are books.

west.description: All you can see are books.

2642.name: In The Library
2642.description: You are in the great library of magic.  A strong musty smell permeates the entire area.  Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds of books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and colour.  The elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained eyes.  It is very quiet here.

north.description: All you can see are books.

east.description: All you can see are books.

south.description: All you can see are books.

west.description: All you can see are books.

2643.name: In The Library
2643.description: You are in the great library of magic.  A strong musty smell permeates the entire area.  Upon shelves which float just out of reach are hundreds of books, tomes and scrolls of every possible shape size and colour.  The elusive books seem to wink in and out of existence before your untrained eyes.  It is very quiet here.

east.description: All you can see are books.

west.description: You see a small gap between some shelves.

2644.name: Between The Shelves
2644.description: You are in the great library of magic.  The shelves seem uncomfortably close here, you can barely maneuver between them.  The musty smell is still strong, and the elusive books still hover just out of reach.    A faint flicker of light can barely be made out to the north.

2645.name: The Reading Room
2645.description: You are in a small room completely devoid of furnishings.  The only thing here is an enormous tome, lying face open on the floor.  The great book looks both heavy and ancient.  Its jewel encrusted bindings are well worn as the bark of a tree.  Spidery writings seem to crawls across the pages, totally incomprehensible to your mortal eye.  Something seems to be wedged between the pages.

2646.name: A Corridor
2646.description: You are in a long corridor leading north and south.  Obsidian walls engraved with ancient runes of power stretch out before you.  Magical energies seem to crackle with power all around and whisper in tongues long forgotten, almost as if the corridor itself were alive.

2647.name: The End Of The Corridor
2647.description: You are at the end of a long corridor.  The obsidian walls come to an abrupt halt at the edge of a golden archway here.  The hum of power is so strong it nearly numbs your body.    The archway lies before you, glowing and pulsing with energy.

2648.name: The Arched Entrance
2648.description: You feel a slight tingle as you pass through the archway, as if the living magical energies here had infused your body, found it wanting and left.  The intense glow from the arch above you is almost blinding.  Through the light you can barely make out a stairway leading up.

2649.name: The Landing
2649.description: You are on a small landing in the middle of a long stairway leading up. Your senses seem dulled here, no sound or smell can be detected at all, and the only thing you can see in any direction is endless stairway.

2650.name: An Intersection
2650.description: You are at an intersection of several hallways.  You feel as if strange mystical forces are pushing and pulling at each other from all around you. The sensation of being trapped, in the middle is almost tangible in the air here.    A grey tiled hallway leads south, black tiled east, white tiled west, and a multi-coloured hallway swirling with patterns that remain just barely unrecognizable is to the north.

2651.name: A Grey Tiled Hallway
2651.description: You are in a grey tiled hallway leading north and south.  Dim balls of energy float here and there shedding a warm light, and showing the way.  A feeling of peace and balance comes over you.

2652.name: A Grey Tiled Hallway
2652.description: You are in a grey tiled hallway leading north and south.  Dim balls of energy float here and there shedding a warm light, and showing the way.  A feeling of peace and balance comes over you.    Large, grey metal double doors can be seen to the south.

2653.name: The Antechamber
2653.description: You are in the antechamber of the Master Magician of the Grey Light. A feeling of strong magic floats in the air about you, almost as if you could taste the power held within these walls.    Once your eyes adjust to the semi-light, you can make out a larger room to the south.

2654.name: The Main Chamber
2654.description: A feeling of tranquility comes over you as you enter the main chamber of Neutrality.  Some artifacts are hung on the walls here, or set on stands. The room in general looks both comfortable and official.  Probably where the Master of Neutrality holds audience.

2655.name: The Study
2655.description: You are in a large study.  Shelves filled with many books or arcane knowledge are on every wall.  A large oaken desk is in the center, with many parchments and scrolls on it.  The most notable thing in the room is a small set of scales, which floats about eye level.  In perfect balance, the scales are no doubt a sign of the Master's neutrality.

2656.name: A Closet
2656.description: You are in a small closet.  It is filled with many cloaks, and some other apparel.

2657.name: A Bedroom
2657.description: You are in the bedroom of the Master Magician of Neutrality. Curtained windows can be seen on the south wall.  A large comfortable looking bed takes up most of the room.

2658.name: A Dark Hallway
2658.description: You are in a long dark hallway leading east and west.  Not much can be seen in the unnatural darkness here, but you get a deep sense of dread the further you go.

2659.name: A Dark Hallway
2659.description: You are in a long dark hallway leading east and west.  Not much can be seen in the unnatural darkness here, but you get a deep sense of dread the further you go.

2660.name: The End Of The Hallway
2660.description: You are at the end of a long dark hallway.  The darkness here is almost tangible in its thickness.  A deep sense of fear and loathing comes over you.    A pair of obsidian doors can be seen to the east.

2661.name: The Chamber Of Darkness
2661.description: You are in a vast chamber.  The walls fade into darkness, leaving you with a very vague idea of the actual size of the room.  Swirling here and there in the dark, are patches of pure black which seem to suck in your light and leave it that much darker here.

2663.name: A Torture Chamber
2663.description: You are in an ill lit chamber.  Instruments of torture hang from a rack on the wall, they seem to quiver with anticipation of a victim as if they had a mind of their own.  An operating table is here, though it is bare.    An extreme feeling of evil permeates the entire area.

2664.name: The Inner Chamber
2664.description: You are in a small dark chamber.  Upon the walls are glowing sigils of dark power, scrawled and traced in an evil language no longer known to most of this plane of existence.  There is an obsidian altar here which seems to glow, but does not shed any light, in fact it seems to be taking light in.

2665.name: A Bright Hallway
2665.description: You are in a long well lit hallway leading east and west.  The walls here are a milky white colour, and glow with a warm luminescence, as does the floor.  A feeling of goodness permeates the area, and you feel unworthy to tread upon these sacred floors.

2666.name: A Bright Hallway
2666.description: You are in a long well lit hallway leading east and west.  The walls here are a milky white colour, and glow with a warm luminescence, as does the floor.  A feeling of goodness permeates the area, and you feel unworthy to tread upon these sacred floors.    A huge set of double doors in finely worked ivory can be seen to the west.

2667.name: An Antechamber
2667.description: You are in a small antechamber.  It is well lit here, though the source of light cannot be seen.  It is almost as if the room itself exudes a warm glow of goodness.  A larger chamber can be seen to the west, but you do not feel worthy to pass into it.

2669.name: The Chamber Of The White Light
2669.description: You are in a vast chamber, its walls floor and ceiling are of an unknown metallic material, the brightest white, almost blindingly stark. A flickering flame is in the center of the room, seeming to feed off of darkness and cleansing the room of any evil.  You feel a slight tug at your being as the flame flickers towards you.

2670.name: The Meditation Chamber
2670.description: You are in a small meditation chamber.  White silk cushions are everywhere, looking very comfortable.  You get an easy peaceful feeling of relaxation here, almost making you want to lie down and fall asleep.

2671.name: A Study
2671.description: You are in a spacious study.  It is extremely tidy here, to an almost antiseptic nature.  One would wonder how anyone could study without a mess all around them, the master of this chamber obviously can.

2672.name: A Closet
2672.description: You are in a small closet.  Cloaks and vests hang from hooks in the wall, and a few old boots are all that can be seen here.  Rather featureless all in all.

2673.name: A Wide Hallway
2673.description: You are in a large hallway, wide enough to accommodate several people standing abreast.  The floor here is a swirl of multicoloured patterns, in constant motion.    A huge, grey metal door blocks the way north, it looks quite sturdy.

2674.name: A Wide Hallway
2674.description: You are in a large hallway, wide enough to accommodate several people standing abreast.  The floor here is a swirl of multicoloured patterns, in constant motion.    A huge, black obsidian door blocks the way north, it looks quite sturdy.

2675.name: A Wide Hallway
2675.description: You are in a large hallway, wide enough to accommodate several people standing abreast.  The floor here is a swirl of multicoloured patterns, in constant motion.    A huge, white ivory door blocks the way north, it looks quite sturdy.

2676.name: The Entranceway
2676.description: You are at the entrance to the audience chamber of the Grand Master of Magic.  Beautiful tapestries displaying the ancient masters of lore are on the walls, and the floor is covered with a plush multicoloured carpet, which seems to rustle and move at the touch of your boots.

2677.name: The Audience Chamber
2677.description: You are in a large chamber.  Small bolts of energy leap from wall to wall, crackling with power.  The floor is a swirl of indeterminable colours and patterns ever changing.  Bright bursts of colour seem to explode into the air and fade again at random times.  All this splendor plays about and draws attention to a large throne in the center of the room, it seems to be cut from a single enormous emerald.

2678.name: A Dressing Room
2678.description: You are in a plush dressing room.  Fine garments of many styles and some outlandish colours hang from a rack suspended in mid air at eye level.  The only other interesting feature in the room is a large silver mirror on a finely crafted gold stand.

2679.name: The Library
2679.description: You are in a small cosy looking library.  A few well made books sit atop shelves which span every wall.  A large oaken writing table is in the center of the room with odd papers and parchments on it.  The illumination here, to your surprise is a quite un-magical oil lamp.

2680.name: The Altar
2680.description: You are in a small chapel designed around a beautifully crafted golden altar.  Many icons to lesser deities line the room, but it is obvious by one glance at the symbols on the altar, that this room was designed for the worship of Mystra, the goddess of magic.

2681.name: The Treasury
2681.description: You are in a small chamber, the stale air here is testament to the fact that it has gone undisturbed for many years.

2682.name: A Passage
2682.description: You are in a small dark passage, which would be unremarkable if not for the fact that it ends in a blinding blue light to the west.  On hooks set into the wall here there hang several travel worthy cloaks, and a small leather backpack.  It looks as if someone has prepared this room to be used in the event speedy of a evacuation.

2683.name: In The Light
2683.description: You seem to be floating in a magical energy field, though you cannot see the source of the energy, you can feel its power pushing at you from all sides, completely negating the effects of gravity.    An imperfection in the uniform blue can be seen overhead, it might be an exit.

2500.name: shadow
2500.long_desc: A shadow guardian screams a challenge and attacks.
2500.description: It seems to be made of nothing more than darkness...

2501.name: adventurer
2501.long_desc: An emaciated adventurer is here looking lost and hopeless.
2501.description: He looks haggard and sickly; no doubt he's been lost here for quite some time.

2502.name: edgar
2502.long_desc: Edgar the Human Swordpupil is standing here, looking quite lost.
2502.description:
Edgar says 'pardon me, can you tell me where to buy cups?'

You see before you, one of Midgaard's finest fighting elite, the mighty
bunny slayer himself, Edgar the Horrible!

2503.name: diamond
2503.long_desc: A huge diamond golem is standing guard here.

2504.name: mage
2504.long_desc: A young mage wanders about, oblivious to all.
2504.description:
He seems to be contemplating life, love and the mysteries of the universe.
Then again, he may just have a headache.

2505.name: strick
2505.long_desc: Strick is here levitating drinks to his customers.
2505.description: He looks rather harmless, but then again so does a sleeping dragon.

2506.name: tatorious
2506.long_desc: Tatorious the wizard is here counting his earnings.

2507.name: ezmerelda
2507.long_desc: Ezmerelda the cook is here stirring a large pot of something.
2507.description:
She does not look like the typical cook you would find in a kitchen,
but she certainly fits what you would expect in a tower fulls of
mages.

2508.name: assistant
2508.long_desc: The cook's assistant is here assisting the cook.
2508.description: This young man is busy adding strange ingredients to the large pot.

2509.name: prisoner
2509.long_desc: A prisoner is chained to the wall here.
2509.description:
Though his clothes are all in rags, you can see that at one time they
must have been fine garments.  A metal muzzle has been fitted over the
poor wretch's mouth, whether to keep him from screaming, or to silence
his spell casting you cannot tell.

He looks quite mad, no doubt he has been mistreated horribly.

2510.name: jailor
2510.long_desc: The Jailor is here enjoying a comfortable nap.

2511.name: broom
2511.long_desc: A straw broom is here leaning against the wall.
2511.description: The broom screams 'Take that you lout!'

2512.name: lesser
2512.long_desc: A pair of disembodied hands floats in the air here.
2512.description: The hands twitch with anticipation of strangling someone.

2513.name: guardian
2513.long_desc: A pair of disembodied eyes floats here glaring at you.

2514.name: mage
2514.long_desc: A visiting mage is here snoring away in peaceful slumber.

2515.name: apprentice
2515.long_desc: A young apprentice magic user is here doing magical studies.
2515.description: She looks quite intent on her studies.

2516.name: apprentice
2516.long_desc: A young apprentice is here mumbling words of magic to himself.
2516.description: He looks to be oblivious to all but the spell he is memorizing.

2517.name: apprentice
2517.long_desc: A young apprentice is sleeping here.

2518.name: apprentice
2518.long_desc: A young apprentice is here teasing a cornered kitten.
2518.description: He looks like a mischievous youth.

2519.name: kitten
2519.long_desc: A small kitten is here meowing in terror.
2519.description:
The little ball of fur looks very unhappy.  Singed fur and a few minor
burns mark its mottled coat.

2520.name: student
2520.long_desc: A student of spells is here looking quite bored.

2521.name: instructor
2521.long_desc: The instructor screams at your interruption and attacks you.
2521.description: He looks quite angry at your interruption.

2522.name: student
2522.long_desc: A student of spells is here trying to master invisibility.
2522.description: He blinks in and out of existence, trying to master the spell.

2523.name: teacher
2523.long_desc: A spell teacher screams at your interruption and attacks.
2523.description: The teacher is quite fierce and rather frightening.

2524.name: student
2524.long_desc: A student of spells has fallen asleep at her desk here.
2524.description: She looks to have collapsed from sheer boredom.

2525.name: wizard
2525.long_desc: An old wizard is here making a speech here.
2525.description:
This wizzened old man looks like he could easily pass for the oldest
living man.  Of course, having heard stories about some of the magic
available to the people living here, and what toll the magic draws...
this man might be as young as you.

2526.name: mage
2526.long_desc: A young mage is here learning hand to hand combat.
2526.description:
This young fellow looks quite confident in his abilities to defend
himself.

2527.name: mistress
2527.long_desc: The battle mistress is here teaching the fine uses of a dagger.
2527.description:
She looks quite rugged. In fact, she more resembles a warrior than a magic
user.

2528.name: mage
2528.long_desc: A spell teacher is here relaxing.
2528.description:
The teacher looks to be worn out by a long day of magic working, difficult
spells, and inattentive students.

2529.name: wizard
2529.long_desc: An aged wizard is sleeping here.
2529.description:
Dreams of magic and power are probably flowing through his head right
now, better not wake him up.

2530.name: scribe
2530.long_desc: A scribe is here working on some manuscripts.
2530.description:
He appears to be copying out some spell ingredients or components right
now.

2531.name: scribe
2531.long_desc: A scribe is here working diligently on some translations.
2531.description:
She is quite cute.  Too bad her only interest seems to be the words of
lore she is translating.

2532.name: master
2532.long_desc: The Master Scribe is here looking a little upset
2532.description:
He seems to be so old, his skin has become nothing but a giant wrinkle.
The master scribe screams 'How dare you interrupt my important work???'

2533.name: assistant
2533.long_desc: The scribe's assistant is here folding parchments.
2533.description:
You can tell that he isn't trusted with the more important documents,
since those ones are rolled and sealed with wax.

2534.name: master
2534.long_desc: The Enchanter is here placing a dweomer upon well made sword.
2534.description:
The Enchanter is hard at work, concentrating on a spell which could
either destroy the weapon or make it many times more powerful than
it already is.

2535.name: sword
2535.long_desc: A well crafted sword lies on the work table here.

2536.name: alchemist
2536.long_desc: The Mad Alchemist babbles something incomprehensible and attacks.
2536.description:
He looks like he has been quaffing too many potions.  His eyes dart
around wildly, and he starts to drool.

The Mad Alchemist throws back his head and cackles with insane glee!

2537.name: master
2537.long_desc: The Master Summoner is here holding gateways open to other planes.
2537.description:
The Summoner looks to be hard at work, concentrating on keeping control
over the gateway before he loses his soul to the creatures on the other
side of it.

2538.name: master
2538.long_desc: The Master Charmer utters the words, 'uuuzzldctz'.
2538.description: The Master Charmer sizes you up, always looking for a new pet.

2539.name: golem
2539.long_desc: A wooden golem stands a silent vigil here, guarding the stairs.

2540.name: master
2540.long_desc: The Master Spellbinder is here re-charging a blackened wand.
2540.description: The Master Spellbinder snarls at you and attacks.

2541.name: master
2541.long_desc: The Golem Maker is here chiseling some stone.
2541.description:
The Golem Master appears to be very meticulous about his work, to
the point of fussing over it.

2542.name: golem
2542.long_desc: A granite golem stands here waiting to do its master's bidding.
2542.description: It looks like a statue, until you see it shamble towards you.

2543.name: golem
2543.long_desc: A bronze golem stands here shining in the light.

2544.name: golem
2544.long_desc: A flesh golem stands guard here
2544.description:
It looks to be made of a potpourri of different body parts; some don't
even resemble anything human.

2545.name: golem
2545.long_desc: A cloth golem wanders around here.
2545.description: It looks like a bunch of old rags, quite surprising it can actually walk.

2546.name: golem
2546.long_desc: An adamantite golem stands here looking very dangerous.
2546.description:
It seems to be forged of dark metal.  It looks strong and durable,
but somewhat un-intelligent.

2547.name: golem
2547.long_desc: A clay golem stands guard here.
2547.description: This large golem almost looks like it is made of dirt.

2548.name: master
2548.long_desc: An enormous multi-colored three-headed dragon growls at you.
2548.description:
The image of an ugly dragon flickers slightly, and where the dragon
was now stands a small harmless looking old man.

2549.name: necromancer
2549.long_desc: The Necromancer is here raising undead servants.
2549.description:
Attired all in black, the Necromancer is tall and gangly, but still quite
an imposing figure.  A dark cowl shrouds most of his face, but two blazing
embers which serve as eyes can be seen through the shadow.
The Necromancer shrieks some obscenities and orders his minions to attack.

2550.name: skeleton
2550.long_desc: An animated skeleton screams silently and attacks.
2550.description: It feels no pain, and hacks at you ruthlessly.

2551.name: undead
2551.long_desc: An undead giant lumbers towards you.
2551.description:
This thing seems to be the reanimated corpse of a giant, creating an
enormous zombie.

2552.name: witch
2552.long_desc: An ugly witch is here scrying out secrets.
2552.description:
She has no face at all, just blank skin, rather disturbing.  From about
where her mouth should be, comes a disgusting giggling sound that makes
your skin crawl with revulsion.

2553.name: librarian
2553.long_desc: The Librarian has fallen asleep at his desk here.
2553.description: He looks like a rather peaceful old man.

2554.name: apprentice
2554.long_desc: The Master's apprentice leaps to halt your passage.
2554.description:
A powerful wizard in his own right, the apprentice of the master of balance
has given up his station in the mage guild hierarchy in order to serve the
Great Master in hopes of gleaning secrets one could never hope to uncover
alone.

2555.name: cat
2555.long_desc: A grey cat is lounging lazily here.
2555.description:
The grey cat cocks an ear towards you, sensing your scrutiny, then purrs
contentedly.  It looks rather harmless, until you notice its very large
claws.

2556.name: master
2556.long_desc: The Master of Neutrality is here contemplating the balance of the Universe.

2557.name: apprentice
2557.long_desc: A black robed apprentice jumps from the shadows and attacks.
2557.description:
She bears a wicked looking scar down the side of her face, though once
she must have been beautiful, now the scar combined with what seems to
be a permanent scowl make her looks quite fearsome.

2558.name: cat
2558.long_desc: A black cat with its fur up hisses at you.
2558.description:
It looks both mean and dangerous.  Petting seems to be completely out of
the question.

2559.name: master
2559.short_desc: the Master of the Black Robes
2559.long_desc: The Master of the Black Robes is here plotting vile deeds.

2560.name: apprentice
2560.long_desc: A white robed apprentice screams at your desecration of goodness.
2560.description:
He looks like a fanatic.
The white robed apprentice screams 'Thou art unworthy of this honour!'

2561.name: cat
2561.long_desc: A white cat is here preening its fur.
2561.description: It seems to be nothing more than a large ball of fluff with claws.

2562.name: master
2562.long_desc: The Master of Goodness is here frowning at your intrusion.
2562.description: He looks like a self-righteous bastard.

2563.name: cat
2563.long_desc: A large calico cat is lounging about here.
2563.description:
It looks incredibly large for a cat, no doubt a giant of its species.
A beautiful jewel encrusted collar about its neck is its only adornment.

2564.name: guildmaster
2564.long_desc: The Grand Mistress of Magic is sitting here.
2564.description:
She looks quite comfortable on her emerald throne. Amazingly young and
pretty for one of such stature in the guild, no doubt she has kept her
youthful appearance through the use of strong magics.
The Grand Mistress pets her familiar and smiles at you in confidence.
